mapper.select: select deductCode, deductName, useStatus, relate from de_product_div
select deductCode, deductName, useStatus, relate from de_product_div where deductCode = #{deductCode}
mapper.insert: insert into de_product_div (deductCode, deductName, useStatus, relate) values (#{deductCode},#{deductName},#{useStatus},#{relate}, #{ciPath})
